exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the terms "p", "p0" and "t" leads to a term fun (p1 : preDTA) (p2 : prec_list) (t0 : term_list) => dt_non_empty_def_2 p1 p2 t0 l which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "dt_non_empty_def_2" of type "forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait d p t -> Prop" cannot be applied to the terms "p1" : "preDTA" "p2" : "prec_list" "t0" : "term_list" "l" : "liste_reconnait p p0 t" The 4th term has type "liste_reconnait p p0 t" which should be coercible to "liste_reconnait p1 p2 t0".

original: intros p p0 t l. induction l using liste_reconnait_ind. - apply dt_non_empty_4. apply rec_empty. - apply dt_non_empty_3. apply IHl. - apply dt_non_empty_4. apply IHl0.
